main event: A bright light, appearing like a star, was observed moving east in Springfield, Illinois on October 9, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes., The object was described as a small, white light., The object moved in a straight eastward direction., There was insufficient data to evaluate if it was an aircraft., The sighting was made with the naked eye.
sighted object: a bright white light moving east
witness description: Visual observation with the naked eye.
